headline: The U.S. Is Discussing Taking a Stake in Intel
summary: The deal talks follow President Trump’s public call for the replacement of CEO Lip-Bu Tan over his ties to Chinese businesses.

raw.headline: The U.S. Is Discussing Taking a Stake in Intel
raw.summary: The deal talks follow President Trump’s public call for the replacement of CEO Lip-Bu Tan over his ties to Chinese businesses.

headline: Tepper’s Appaloosa Raises Stake in UnitedHealth, Adds Intel
summary: David Tepper’s Appaloosa snapped up shares of  UnitedHealth  Group during the second quarter and took new stakes in Intel and other stocks, according to a regulatory filing.  The investment manager increased Appaloosa’s UnitedHealth holdings to 2.45 million shares, up from 180,000 shares in the first quarter.  The latest stake, as of the end of June, was reported to be $764 million.

headline: Data Center GPU Company Evaluation Report 2025 | NVIDIA, Intel, and AMD Lead
summary: The "Data Center GPU Companies Quadrant" report offers an in-depth analysis of the global GPU market, spotlighting leading companies and industry trends. Evaluating over 112 firms, the report highlights the top 12 Data Center GPU leaders such as NVIDIA, Intel, and AMD. These GPUs, initially for gaming, now drive AI, machine learning, and high-performance computing due to their exceptional parallel processing capabilities. headline: Trump’s Emerging Market Behavior Is Unsettling Investors. How It Could Hit Markets.
summary: The president has fired a statistician, pressured the central bank, and called for a CEO to quit. Those are hallmarks of an emerging market, strategists say.
